titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (COMMUNICATION QUESTION D) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (COMMUNICATION QUESTION D) is the PERSON SCORE for question D of the Communication section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Does this child have difficulty with understanding outside of familiar context?".
